package.name: Buckaroo NVP Payment Provider for uWebshop2

info.readme:
Buckaroo Payment Provider Provider for uWebshop
This package wil install the PayPal payment provider for uWebshop It installs the Buckaroo Provider DLL and creates the Buckaroo Node in the Payment Providers Section. It also updates the /app_plugins/uWebshop/config/paymentprovdiers.config file
